eligibility-check.header: Confirm you need a Home Office right to rent check
eligibility-check.intro: Answer up to 6 questions to make sure you can use this service.

documents-check.intro: If the person has documents showing whether they can live in the UK or not, you need to do the check yourself.

documents-check-yourself.header: You need to do the right to rent check yourself
documents-check-yourself.intro: If the person has documents, you need to perform the check yourself.

check-not-needed-uk.header: You do not need a Home Office right to rent check
check-not-needed-uk.intro: You can't do a right to rent check until the person is in the UK.

check-not-needed-date.header: You do not need a Home Office right to rent check
check-not-needed-date.intro: You only need to use this service if the tenancy started after 1 February 2016 (or 1 December 2014 in the West Midlands).

check-confirmed.header: You can use the Home Office right to rent check
check-confirmed.intro: Please check them carefully. If you need to change anything later, you'll have to start again.

table.address: What is the rental property address

start.custom-header: Request a Home Office right to rent check

person-in-property.intro: You can add more people later if you need to.

tenant-additional-details.header: What additional information can you provide for {{values.tenant-name}}?

tenant-another.header: Is there another person on the same tenancy you'd like to request a check for?

headers.name: Name
headers.recorded-delivery: Recorded delivery number of latest application

check-not-needed-location.header: You do not need a Home Office right to rent check

declaration.agent: you are an agent acting on behalf of the landlord
declaration.email-paragraph: When you've submitted this request, we'll send a copy of the information you’ve provided to {{declarerEmail}}.
